content: i just saw the new michael reeves video when he uses chatgpt to lowball peeps on fb marketplace and im just sitting here wondering why openai??? why chat gpt???? thier api aint free so he paied for the use... like... it's 0.05â‚¬ per request i assume so like... just use open source models... deepseek, llama idk there's like 100s of those now, also kinda funny how i am trying to do simular thing without the gaslighting and lowballing but for fun
